meanings.definition: A phospholipid found in nerve tissue.
meanings.sent1: The kephalin helps protect the nerves in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the effects of kephalin on nerve health.
meanings.sent3: The kephalin in the brain decided to throw a party for the neurons.
meanings.sent4: Her love for learning was like kephalin, nurturing her mind.
meanings.sent5: The kephalin acted as a shield, guarding the nerve cells from harm.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of phospholipids that are found in nerve tissue and have a nitrogen-containing base.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the different types of kephalin present in nerve cells.
meanings.sent2: The kephalin molecules play a crucial role in nerve function.
meanings.sent3: The kephalin group gathered for a chemistry party in the brain.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like kephalin, forming the foundation of his creativity.
meanings.sent5: The kephalin family worked together to support the nerve system.
